scripts.gen:sdk: npm --prefix apps/backend run gen:sdk && npm run build:sdk
scripts.validate:openapi: npx swagger-jsdoc -d apps/backend/openapi.yaml && echo "OpenAPI spec is valid"
scripts.ci:check: npm run validate:openapi && npm run gen:sdk && npm run build:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix apps/backend install && npm --prefix apps/frontend install && npm --prefix packages/sdk install && npm --prefix packages/domain-models install
